nodes.text: The Moll K-19 power generator was first identified in Star Wars Rebels: The Visual Guide, a reference book written by Adam Bray and released in 2014. The name of the Joben T-85 speeder bike and all its components are references to Star Wars Legends characters from the Star Wars: Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO, with the bike being named after Thall Joben, the generator being named for Kea Moll and the bike's weaponry, the Dusat aft-firing EMP emitter, sharing its name with Jord Dusat.
